page.title: 09SHOPPING SURVEY PART 2
page.content:
{DULCOTE:_ GROC FURN CHEM ELEC {Wells } 6 o 6 2 {Bath } 0 1 0 0 {Bristol } 0 1 0 2 {Shepton Mallet }0 3 0 1
{E.HORRINGTON:_ {Wells } 6 0 6 2 {Bath }0 2 1 2 {Bristol }0 1 0 2 {Shepton Mallet 0 1 0 } 0
The results show that Wells is the main shopping centre in the area, although Shepton Mallet becomes more important to Croscombe residents. Bath and Bristol (approx. 30km away) are significant centres for furniture and electrical goods and Shepton Mallet has a large furniture store. Catalogues are used by 25% in each centre. 50_75% of shoppers use a car.
